tests.fullTitle: T3 System: CustodianRegistry and T3Token T3Token Transfer Functionality (Extended with Pre-funding) Should revert if withdrawing more pre-funded fees than available

tests.fullTitle: T3 System: CustodianRegistry and T3Token T3Token Transfer Functionality (Extended with Pre-funding) Should fail to transfer more than balance (considering fee from balance)
